basics.name: Rodrigo Gambra-Middleton
basics.label: Android Developer | Web Developer | Data Scientist (trainee)
basics.summary:
Android/Web Developer, Fledging Data Scientist, Veterinarian, and Biomedical Scientific Translator.

Alumn of The University of Queensland (Australia), the University of Chile, and the 'Talento Digital' programme of the Chilean Ministry of Economy.

Let's build your next app together!

work.summary: Development of web applications | Startup business management
highlights: Developed payment gateway to connect Hikashop with Transbank Webpay
Designed and developed Tiktaalik Dev's website
Planned and executed administrative and business management tasks
Helped Chilean scientists to publish their research in academic journals
Translation of Spanish scientific texts to English
Editing articles to conform to the style of the target journal
Building References list and checking citations

volunteer.organization: Asociación de Amigos del Animal Abandonado
volunteer.summary: Leading member in charge of care, rehabilitation and rehoming of stary cats and dogs.
highlights: Member of the executive board of the association
Organisation of daily schedules for daily shelter activities
Feeding, care, rehabilitation of sheltered animals
Organisation and manning of adoption events

awards.title: Talento Digital Scholarship
awards.awarder: Talento Digital Programme of the Chilean Ministry of Economy
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to a select group of applicants to complete an Specialisation in Data Science.
